participant_1.name: Emily

participant_1.background: i hate school. i have blue eyes and red hair that comes to my waist. i am a 12 year old girl. i love to play pobox.

participant_2.name: Liam

participant_2.background: i'm scared of dying. knitting is my passion. i've a dogs. the county wide bake sale is where i feel most at home.

content.text: Hi how are you today how are you?
I am good thanks. What s your favorite color? Mine is red.
I do not have a favorite color. What is yours?
I do not like school either!
